member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.LangIdentify(System.String)
member.summary: Detects which language the source text is in.
member.param: text to have the source language identified.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.Translate(System.String)
member.summary: Translates the sentences passed to it using the selected engine.
member.param: Text to be translated.
member.returns: Returns the translated text passed in the call parameter.
member.exception: Returns exception in case something goes wrong in the translation steps.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.TranslateAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Translates the sentences passed to it using the selected engine.
member.param: Text to be translated.
member.returns: Returns the translated text passed in the call parameter.
member.exception: Returns exception in case something goes wrong in the translation steps.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

LanguageInfo name.
Necessary font name.
List of all the needed chars to be added.
Supported translation engines.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.DrawText(System.String,System.Drawing.Font,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Size})
member.summary: Creates an image containing the given text. NOTE: the image should be disposed after use.
member.param: Text to draw.
Font to use, defaults to Control.DefaultFont.
Text color, defaults to Black.
Background color, defaults to white.
Minimum image size, defaults the size required to display the text.
member.returns: The image containing the text, which should be disposed after use.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.Echoglossian.TranslationImageConverter(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Converts Image to byte array.
member.param: Image to be converted.
member.returns: Byte array to be used elsewhere.

member.name: T:Echoglossian.AtkTextNodeBufferWrapper
member.summary: Provides a wrapper for managing a UTF-8 encoded text buffer using unmanaged memory.

member.name: P:Echoglossian.AtkTextNodeBufferWrapper.GetBuffer
member.summary: Gets the buffer containing the UTF-8 encoded string.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.AtkTextNodeBufferWrapper.SetBuffer(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the buffer to the UTF-8 representation of the given string. The buffer is reallocated if it doesn't already exist or is too small.
member.param: The string to be encoded and stored in the buffer.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.AtkTextNodeBufferWrapper.FreeBuffer
member.summary: Frees the previously allocated buffer.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.ChatGPTTranslator.Translate(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates the specified text from the source language to the target language.
member.param: The text to translate.
The source language of the text.
The target language for the translation.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.ChatGPTTranslator.TranslateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates the specified text from the source language to the target language asynchronously.
member.param: The text to translate.
The source language of the text.
The target language for the translation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous translation operation. The task result contains the translated text.

member.name: M:Echoglossian.DeepLTranslator.FreeTranslateAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Translates a string using the Free DeepL API.
member.param: The text to translate.
The source language of the text.
The target language for the translation.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:Echoglossian.Properties.Resources.WhichToastsToTranslate
